    API Reference Serving your own site

    Function reference

    All functions

    create_sysreqs_site()
    Create a local system requirements site
    fetch_patterns()
    Return list of library regex patterns
    fetch_pkg()
    Get a packages information
    fetch_pkg_deps()
    Get a packages system requirements
    fetch_rules()
    Get rules for a given system library
    fetch_systems()
    Get supported operating systems
    get_lib_reqs()
    Identify system library requirements
    get_pkg_sysreqs()
    Get system requirements for a package
    get_pkgs_sysreqs()
    Get system requirements for multiple packages
    serve_sysreqs()
    Serve a local version of the system requirements site
    stop_sysreqs()
    Stop serving system requirements site

    Developed by Josiah Parry.

    Site built with pkgdown 2.0.2.
